title: GDP deflator decreases, inflation is negative

content.question: Using 2010 as the base year, the gross domestic product <math alttext="open parenthesis, G D P, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>GDP</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> deflator in 2011 was 97. Which of the following must be true?

choices.label: The inflation rate in 2011 was positive.
The inflation rate in 2011 was negative.
The inflation rate in 2011 was zero.
The purchasing power of a dollar decreased by 3 percent.
The real output increased by 3 percent.

content.answer: The inflation rate in 2011 was negative.
